TopicTitle: My space station keeps ripping apart

Articles.Content: I feel so defeated right now   After spending all weekend building my first space station, Today i loaded up my save file and as soon as the game loads, my space station starts to shake back and forth violently until it starts to rip apart.   I tried all sorts of things from quickly turning off SAS or RCS, keeping them on, changing direction, anything I can think of. But no matter what it will shake and rip apart within a couple seconds. It was orbiting fine last night when i last saved it.   I dont have any other save files because ive read so many stories of peoples save files having issues I didnt want to clutter my game files up.  So I just had that 1 save file.   This is such a huge bummer for me since I spent so long building this.  I really hope the Devs can get this game figured out soon and fix all these issues the game has.  This is the first major issue ive had and it really hurts my experience with the game.  I likely wont be playing now any time soon until i know its safe to do so again.  That was alot of time wasted and now lost.

I feel your pain. I spent two weeks trying to launch a big ol station using the xl docking ports and xl payload truss sections.  Built and rebuilt dozens of times.  Never got it to work.. or even to orbit for that matter.  Could never get it to hold together long enough.  

 

And this didn't even get into the orbital assembly unpacking phase
